description: The HSP_TRTMT_TEAM table contains information on inpatient treatment teams. Each record in this table is based on PAT_ENC_CSN_ID.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number of the treatment team member for the patient.

columns.name: TRTMNT_TM_BEGIN_DT
columns.description: The date and time the treatment team member started for the patient.

columns.name: TRTMNT_TM_END_DT
columns.description: The date and time the treatment team member ended for the patient.

columns.name: TRTMNT_TM_ED_YN
columns.description:
Indicates whether or not this provider was on the treatment team in the ED.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


No


Yes

columns.name: PAT_ENC_CSN_ID
columns.description: A unique serial number for this encounter. This number is unique across all patients and encounters in the system.

columns.name: TEAM_ADD_YN
columns.description:
This stores whether the line was added by a team.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: TRTMNT_TM_ED_YN
